info.title: Ent Schema API
info.description: This is an auto generated API description made out of an Ent schema definition

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: item count to render per page

post.description: Creates a new Integration and persists it to storage.

get.description: Finds the Integration with the requested ID and returns it.

200.description: Integration with requested ID was found

delete.description: Deletes the Integration with the requested ID.

204.description: Integration with requested ID was deleted

patch.description: Updates a Integration and persists changes to storage.

get.description: Find the attached Organization of the Integration with the given ID

200.description: Organization attached to Integration with requested ID was found

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: item count to render per page

post.description: Creates a new Membership and persists it to storage.

get.description: Finds the Membership with the requested ID and returns it.

200.description: Membership with requested ID was found

delete.description: Deletes the Membership with the requested ID.

204.description: Membership with requested ID was deleted

patch.description: Updates a Membership and persists changes to storage.

get.description: Find the attached Organization of the Membership with the given ID

200.description: Organization attached to Membership with requested ID was found

get.description: Find the attached User of the Membership with the given ID

200.description: User attached to Membership with requested ID was found
